All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ConsoleView
class ConsoleView uses the RegistrationSystem controller provides a menu with student and teacher side, with specific actions provides Input validation methods, stores currently logged In student or teacher
Course
class Course stores and provides information about a course's: name, id, teacher, maximal enrollment number, enrolled students, number of credits
CourseRepository
CourseRepository class extending FileRepository reading, storing, updating and saving Courses instances in repoList and file
CourseRepositoryTest
CourseRepositoryTest class testing CourseRepository class
FileRepository<T>
FileRepository class implementing ICrudRepository reading, storing, updating and saving information about the list of T objects in a file
ICrudRepository<T>
CRUD operations repository interface
InputException
InputException class extends Exception used for wrong input parameters in the RegistrationSystem (Controller) class wrong input meaning: non-existing instances in the repositories or impossible instances to perform an action
Main
 
NullException
NullException class extends Exception used for the Repository classes, preventing having null as a parameter in the methods
Person
Abstract class Person stores and provides information about a person's: first and last name
RegistrationSystem
RegistrationSystem class storing repo lists of: students, teachers, courses, file with current enrollment
RegistrationSystemTest
RegistrationSystemTest class test RegistrationSystem class
Student
class Student extends abstract class Person stores and provides information about a student's : id, first name, last name, total credits number and enrolled courses
StudentRepository
StudentRepository class extending FileRepository reading, storing, updating and saving Student instances in repoList and file
StudentRepositoryTest
StudentRepositoryTest class testing StudentRepository class
Teacher
class Teacher extends abstract class Person stores and provides information about a teacher's: id, first name, last name, list of courses
TeacherRepository
TeacherRepository class extending FileRepository reading, storing, updating and saving Teacher instances in repoList and file
TeacherRepositoryTest
TeacherRepositoryTest class test TeacherRepository class
